class txsscanlib.secretion.HMMReport(gene, hmmer_output, hmmer_err, hmmer_returncode, cfg)¶

handle HMM report. extract a synthetic report from the raw hmmer output

__init__(gene, hmmer_output, hmmer_err, hmmer_returncode, cfg)¶
Parameters:
  • gene (txsscanlib.secretion.Gene object) – the gene corresponding to this profile
  • hmmer_output (string) – The path to hmmer output file
  • hmmer_err (string) – The path to the hmmer error file
  • hmmer_returncode (int) – the return code of the hmmer
  • cfg (txsscanlib.config.Config object) – the configuration
__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

extract()¶

Parse the output file of hmmer and produced a new synthetic report file

class txsscanlib.secretion.Homolog(name, cfg, gene_ref, aligned=False)¶

handle homologs

__init__(name, cfg, gene_ref, aligned=False)¶
Parameters:
  • name (string) – the name of the gene
  • cfg (txsscanlib.config.Config object.) – the configuration
  • gene_ref (txsscanlib.secretion.Gene object.) – the gene which this one is homolog.
  • aligned (boolean) – if True, this gene overlap totally the sequence of the gene reference. Otherwise it overlap partially.
gene_ref¶
Returns:the gene of reference to this homolog
Return type:txsscanlib.secretion.Gene object
is_aligned()¶
Returns:Tue if this homolog is align to it’s gene of reference, False otherwise.
Return type:boolean
